meta.name: description
meta.content: Welcome to the online home of George Gervin Prep Academy. We are a unique school for Phoenix youth, preparing them for college with rigorous coursework while teaching responsible thinking and community service projects.

br.p: Please read the following newsletter from ASBCS:

br.span: // Welcome to George Gervin Prep Academy //

div.p: Welcome to the online home of George Gervin Prep Academy. We are a unique school for Phoenix youth, preparing them for college and career readiness.
The foundation of our school is based on the five pillars:

We invite you to learn more about our innovative school and the outstanding opportunities we have for our students. Find out about services we provide to our community, and learn about the exceptional instruction students receive.If you have questions, please contact us.

p.span: The George Gervin Prep Academy aspires to create an elite learning community that eliminates academic barriers while enveloping the students, parents, and faculty in an atmosphere of academic creativity and motivation that prepares students for success today and into the future.

div.p: Starting March 19, 2020, GGPA will be providing a snack pack and a book on a first come first serve basis.

During the school closure ordered by Governor Ducey, many of the surrounding districts are providing free grab and go meals for breakfast and lunch Monday through Friday for all children ages 18 and under. Read more >>>

div.b: Important Notice for GGPA Community March 13, 2020

div.p: After careful consideration, George Gervin Prep Academy will be closed to students until further notice beginning March 16, 2020, in order to help contain the spread of COVID-19 in our community. During this time, our school leadership will continue to stay updated on the COVID-19 situation in our county, state, and nation. Read more >>>
If you live in any of the following situations, you may qualify for certain rights and protections under the federal McKinney-Vento act. Read more >>>

div.b: Participate in the NSLP Breakfast and Lunch Program

div.p: We are committed to providing every student in our school community with all the tools they need to succeed, including nutritious meals that everyone can enjoy together. Read more >>>

p.span: We are now enrolling kindergarten through 8th grade students. Do you have a child who is turning 5 by December 31? Enroll now to save their seat for a fun-filled year of learning here at GGPA.

div.ul:
Free transportation
Free after-school program
Participate in the NSLP Breakfast and Lunch Program
Extracurricular after-school activities < Read more >>>

center.div: Copyright 2014-2020 George Gervin Prep Academy | Site designed and maintained by School Webmasters

br.br:
>
After careful consideration, George Gervin Prep Academy will be closed to students until further notice beginning March 16, 2020, in order to help contain the spread of COVID-19 in our community. During this time, our school leadership will continue to stay updated on the COVID-19 situation in our county, state, and nation.
We want to assure all families and staff that this decision was made only after thoughtful consideration of the facts and the potential impact on our community. We will continue to communicate and provide updates regarding alternative and digital learning for students and timeframe of reopening the school.
Again, GGPA students will not return from spring break next week. We will continue to post updates on our web page, our telephone Smart Call system, Facebook, and Class Dojo.
Thank you for your patience.
Sincerely,
Principal Crawford
Superintendent Hawkins
During the school closure ordered by Governor Ducey, many of the surrounding districts are providing free grab and go meals for breakfast and lunch. Please view our flyer for meal locations.
